I’ll be handling the UI design of our project, with my main focus on front-end development. At the same time, I’ll also be supporting the back-end side whenever needed so our system works smoothly as one. On top of that, I manage the group to keep us on track, organized, and moving forward as a team.

I also assist in applying the planned UI and front-end design based on our UI designer, as as giving additional suggestions to help make our application\'s interface more user friendly. As well as providing functionalities for each page in our application both for proper functionalities and for the user's experiencing in using our application.

I apply the planned UI to the application and support adjustments to the design for user experience improvements, as well as add animations to make our work livelier and more creative. I also work on the back end of the application, providing functionality to its elements.
I am one of the backend programmers of this team. I am dedicated to provide a smooth and organized collaboration with my peers and collaborators. Lorem ipsum kenemerut kenemerut test.
